name: MLLP to File Basic Flow
description: Send HL7 via MLLP, verify ACK response. Tests MLLP framing, HL7v2 parsing, and ACK generation.

name: MLLP Complex ADT
description: Send complex ADT A01 message via MLLP, verify ACK matches between engines.

name: MLLP ORU Result
description: Send ORU R01 lab result message via MLLP, verify ACK matches between engines.
